extendedInfo.description: Compete for the best scores and times in this ultimate summer sports game designed specially for the touch screen with groundbreaking innovative and intuitive swipe controls. Make new world records in various disciplines like hurdle, long jump, archery or challenge and beat your friends in additional disciplines like meters, freestyle and javelin. Join players worldwide, challenge them and be the best! âââââ Regular content updates with new and amazing disciplines coming soon! ââââââ¨â¨â From the makers of various top 100 apps like Wingsuit Stickman, Stick Stunt Biker, Line Runner, Line Birds, Rope'n'Fly, Line Surfer, RunStickRun and more â¨â¨FEATURES:â¨ â¢ 12 amazing olympic disciplines including Meters, Hurdles, Javelin, Long jump, Freestyle and Archery â¢ Innovative natural feeling swipe gestures controlâ¨ â¢ Full challenge system with more than 100 different challenges to pass â¢ Kiip enabled, Get real world rewards when playing (e.g. discounts) â¢ Prize Money for each discipline â¨â¢ Customization shop to customize your player and other stuff with earned coinsâ¨ â¢ Fluid and smooth motion animationâ¨ â¢ Amazing Retina Graphicsâ¨ â¢ Online and Offline leaderboardâ¨ â¢ Game Center and Openfeint enabledâ¨ â¢ Directly compare yourself against all other players or your friends â¢ No adsâ¨â¢ and many more... â¨â¨â¨Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possible â¨Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!

reviews.title: Good.......but.
reviews.comment: The app is great but, it\'d be better if you could compete against other athletes.
reviews.author: Eric Cornelius Jr

reviews.title: great game
reviews.comment: amazing game. please add more sports!!
reviews.author: Jonah Schofield-Fitzpatrick

reviews.title: Fix bugs!
reviews.comment: Leaderboard won\'t load in the game. Still a pretty fun game.
reviews.author: Owen Ibarra

reviews.title: Cant customise
reviews.comment: It won\'t let me customise my  character please fix!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Heinu Wessels

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Every running game and swimming game doesnt work properly
reviews.author: Sean Sweeney

reviews.title: Gavin
reviews.comment: Great game
reviews.author: Gavin Leeroscom

reviews.title: Locks up
reviews.comment: Locks up then kicks me out of the game after an event. If I\'m going to pay for a game it should work. RAZR maxx.
reviews.author: jeremy ward

reviews.title: Fix App!!!!
reviews.comment: After I finish each event, the game force closes. Very annoying, please fix. I like to play this game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: rightlock
reviews.comment: fun for a bit but quickly tiresome
reviews.author: daniel pott

reviews.title: Horrible.
reviews.comment: Every time I finish one of the games it exits out of the app. Please fix this, it is really annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Refund
reviews.comment: I can only play something and i dont get coins wat the fck plz fix
reviews.author: Jaime Emerson

reviews.title: Game is good but...
reviews.comment: Controls to far apart to work plus the game freezes as soon as I\'ve finished an event.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ridiculous
reviews.comment: Every time I complete a discapline it shuts off! :( Fun game though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crash!
reviews.comment: It crashes after completing an event! FIX ASAP!
reviews.author: Brian Smith

reviews.title: Has bug
reviews.comment: Every time I finish an event it closes on me.
reviews.author: Joe Griffith

reviews.title: Openfeint
reviews.comment: Openfeint will not work keep getting error 405   And ever since this happened all my times have slowed dramatically
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad. Needs new featurea
reviews.comment: Good game. Would be better if u can race against ur own high score like ghost image running next to you

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: None of the buttons work

reviews.title: Lot of bugs - htc sensation
reviews.comment: Back button end game, Can\'t customize character-keeps scrolling, Buttons often not working...  Please fix it.  Still awesome game though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Don\'t buy play London Olympics,I don\'t know why this is a paid game.
